thread.title: NYX Gaming Group Ltd expands partnership with Caesars Interactive and launches NYX OGS™ on CaesarsCasino.com in New Jersey
thread.title_full: NYX Gaming Group Ltd expands partnership with Caesars Interactive and launches NYX OGS™ on CaesarsCasino.com in New Jersey - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: NYX Gaming Group Ltd expands partnership with Caesars Interactive and launches NYX OGS™ on CaesarsCasino.com in New Jersey
text:
NYX Gaming Group Ltd.
LAS VEGAS, NV , Sept. 16, 2015 /CNW/ - NYX Gaming Group Limited (TSXV: NYX) ("NYX Gaming Group"), a market leading content and technology supplier to lotteries, casinos and gaming operators across the globe, is excited to announce that its proprietary Open Gaming System ("NYX OGS™") was launched on CaesarsCasino.com, the real-money gaming online casino in New Jersey .
NYX Gaming Group Limited is proud to announce the launch of NYX OGS™ with Caesars Interactive Entertainment ("CIE"), enabling CaesarsCasino.com to launch casino games in both mobile and desktop formats immediately. The partnership covers the licensing of 40 NYX proprietary slot titles, including 38 mobile titles, as well as approved third party content delivered via the single NYX OGS™ integration.
NYX Gaming Group Limited CEO Matt Davey said, "We are thrilled that Caesars Interactive has decided to launch our portfolio of award winning content via NYX OGS™ on CaesarsCasino.com. We continue to work closely with them and forecast great success with this new venture."
Marco Ceccarelli , Senior Vice President and Chief Information Officer for Caesars Interactive Entertainment said, "The integration of NYX OGS™ on CaesarsCasino.com allows us to quickly launch 40 new NYX slot games to the New Jersey market and significantly improve our mobile game offering on both iOS and Android. We look forward to working with NYX and highly value its commitment to deliver us an ongoing supply of additional content."
The launch of NYX OGS™ on CaesarsCasino.com is the result of the excellent working relationship between both parties and further evidence of the concrete demand for NYX Gaming Group supplied content to leading, regulated B2C providers worldwide.
ABOUT NYX GAMING GROUP
NYX Gaming Group is headquartered in Las Vegas with development out of Stockholm and Sydney . The group provides flexible gaming solutions to some of the largest lotteries, casinos, poker rooms and iGaming operators across the globe.
NYX Poker Network, is a leading internet poker network deliver poker solutions for online poker operators world-wide.
Game development arm NextGen Gaming is the industry's leading platform agnostic provider of engaging, repeat play Slots, providing entertainment for players and profits for Operators.
The technology division, NYX Interactive, specialize in developing gaming system solutions for World Lottery Association members, media companies and both private and publicly listed Gaming companies worldwide. Through its Open Platform System(OPS™), operators can take advantage of best of breed products and services, including their own, all managed via a single interface. Through its fully hosted Open Gaming System (OGS™), licensees can leverage the best in multi-­vendor Casino content from around the world.
The Las Vegas office provides social Poker & Casino solutions out of the group headquarters.
NYX Gaming Group is a proud recipient of the Special Achievement Award from EGR Magazine, which recognized the group's consistent growth and innovation in multiple egaming verticals.
About Caesars Interactive
Caesars Interactive Entertainment, Inc. ("CIE") is one of the largest online, mobile and social gaming companies and is focused on casino entertainment and is a subsidiary of Caesars Growth Partners, LLC, which is a joint venture between Caesars Acquisition Company ("CAC") and Caesars Entertainment Corporation ("Caesars Entertainment"), the world's most diversified casino-entertainment provider and the most geographically diverse U.S. casino- entertainment company.
CIE owns the World Series of Poker ("WSOP"); plus multiple social game developers, all under its Playtika division. Games include Slotomania, Caesars Casino, Bingo Blitz, House of Fun and World Series of Poker. In addition, CIE operates a play for fun and real money poker game in Nevada and New Jersey. For more information, visit www.caesarsinteractive.com.
